journey_episodes.title: Initial Health Inquiry & Onboarding
journey_episodes.primary_goal: Member seeks help for high blood pressure and fatigue

key_interactions.action: Initial health inquiry with BP readings 135/85
Welcome and coordination offer
Schedule intro call with Dr. Warren

persona_evolution.before_state: Health-conscious individual with concerning symptoms seeking professional guidance
persona_evolution.after_state: Engaged member with scheduled medical consultation and clear next steps

journey_episodes.title: Team Introduction & Initial Assessment
journey_episodes.primary_goal: Establish baseline through team introductions and initial assessments

key_interactions.action: Proactive inquiry about DASH diet
Expresses time constraint (5 hours/week total)
Introduces movement assessment

friction_points.description: Food logging perceived as tedious by time-constrained member

persona_evolution.before_state: Engaged member with scheduled medical consultation
persona_evolution.after_state: Active participant adapting processes to fit lifestyle constraints

journey_episodes.title: Schedule Coordination & Data Integration
journey_episodes.primary_goal: Coordinate diagnostics and integrate wearable data

key_interactions.action: Coordinate comprehensive diagnostic panel
Request Garmin data access
Proactive travel notification (London Feb 12-16)

friction_points.description: Member requests to push tests to February due to packed January

persona_evolution.before_state: Active participant adapting processes to fit lifestyle constraints
persona_evolution.after_state: Collaborative partner proactively managing schedule integration

journey_episodes.title: First Results & Sleep Optimization
journey_episodes.primary_goal: Address sleep quality issues and show initial progress

key_interactions.action: Identifies low deep sleep as fatigue contributor
Reports 18% increase in deep sleep from consistent bedtime

persona_evolution.before_state: Collaborative partner proactively managing schedule integration
persona_evolution.after_state: Motivated participant seeing tangible results from data-driven interventions

journey_episodes.title: Travel Adaptation & Consistency Challenges
journey_episodes.primary_goal: Maintain program consistency during business travel

key_interactions.action: Provides travel-specific workout plans
Reports challenge maintaining routine during hectic London trip
Acknowledges 5-hour weekly limit as 'real ceiling'

friction_points.description: Business travel makes diet and exercise difficult to control
friction_points.resolution: Team provides realistic expectations and recovery protocols

friction_points.description: Member reaffirms 5-hour weekly limit as hard constraint
friction_points.resolution: Adaptive programming to maintain habits within constraints

persona_evolution.after_state: Realistic participant understanding program limitations and adaptations

journey_episodes.title: Advanced Biomarker Focus & Zone 2 Integration
journey_episodes.primary_goal: Address ApoB concerns with targeted cardiovascular interventions

key_interactions.action: Demonstrates knowledge of ApoB and Zone 2 cardio from Peter Attia's work
Integrates Zone 2 cardio protocol for ApoB improvement
Reports inability to fit additional 30-45 minutes consistently

friction_points.description: Adding Zone 2 cardio exceeds member's time constraints
friction_points.resolution: Swap approach - replace existing sessions rather than add new ones

persona_evolution.after_state: Sophisticated participant actively problem-solving within constraints

journey_episodes.title: Quarterly Review & Strategic Planning
journey_episodes.primary_goal: Comprehensive review and Q2 strategy development

key_interactions.action: Conducts productive quarterly review
Expresses satisfaction with comprehensive overview and Q2 plan

persona_evolution.before_state: Sophisticated participant actively problem-solving within constraints
persona_evolution.after_state: Strategic partner aligned on long-term health optimization approach

journey_episodes.title: Stress Management Integration
journey_episodes.primary_goal: Address stress and explore meditation for blood pressure

key_interactions.action: Inquires about meditation for blood pressure
Reports work stress affecting workout consistency

friction_points.resolution: Focus on essential exercises and stress management resources

persona_evolution.before_state: Strategic partner aligned on long-term approach
persona_evolution.after_state: Holistic health participant addressing multiple wellness dimensions

key_interactions.action: Requests preliminary results
Reports home BP consistently lower at 125/80
Celebrates 15% ApoB reduction as 'fantastic news'

persona_evolution.before_state: Holistic health participant addressing multiple wellness dimensions
persona_evolution.after_state: Validated success story with measurable health improvements

journey_episodes.title: Advanced Optimization & Plateau Management
journey_episodes.primary_goal: Navigate plateaus and optimize advanced protocols

key_interactions.action: Reports feeling plateau despite consistency
Introduces refeed day strategy for metabolic reset
Positive response to refeed day implementation

friction_points.description: Member experiences staleness despite good adherence
friction_points.resolution: Strategic refeed days and deload weeks for physiological and psychological reset

persona_evolution.before_state: Validated success story with measurable improvements
persona_evolution.after_state: Advanced practitioner learning sophisticated optimization strategies

journey_episodes.title: Autonomous Health Management Development
journey_episodes.primary_goal: Develop member's autonomous health management capabilities

key_interactions.action: Self-reports fatigue and low Garmin Body Battery scores
Accepts data-driven recommendation to modify workout despite mental resistance
Acknowledges member's evolution toward autonomous health management

persona_evolution.before_state: Advanced practitioner learning sophisticated optimization strategies
persona_evolution.after_state: Autonomous health manager capable of self-directed decision making

behavioral_changes.nutrition_adherence: Sustainable through travel and work stress

program_efficiency.travel_adaptability: Successful protocol execution across multiple trips

explicit_satisfaction_statements: The comprehensive overview was very clear and helpful
It's good to see the data confirm that the effort is paying off
That's fantastic news. A 15% drop in ApoB is more than I expected
The plan sounds good. I'm happy with the progress and ready for the next phase

engagement_indicators.self_monitoring_adoption: Full integration of wearable data interpretation

trust_building_evidence: Accepts data-driven recommendations even when counterintuitive
Proactively shares schedule constraints and travel plans
Implements advanced strategies like refeed days and deload weeks
Demonstrates autonomous decision-making using team-provided frameworks

expertise_demonstration.evidence_based_recommendations: Citations of Peter Attia, DASH diet research
expertise_demonstration.progressive_complexity: Graduated from basic to advanced protocols

member_development.education_provided: Understanding of biomarkers, recovery metrics, periodization
member_development.autonomy_building: Transition from guided to self-directed health management

successful_adaptations: Photo-based food tracking vs detailed logging
Exercise substitution vs addition for time constraints
key_turning_points: Initial sleep optimization showing quick wins
